name: LockedIn (SpyPuppet)
description:
This game was made for TheIndieTales 2021 game jam.

It's theme was One Room and everything had to be made for the jam.

It was my first time attempting to do my own art, sadly I ran out of time so there's very little animation to the sprites, and the character was left in it's silhouette stage.


Controls

A and D or Left and Right arrows to move

Click to interact with some objects, be mindful you have to be somewhat close.

Credits

Art and code by me

Script by Andressa Vasques <3
